Reviews.Content: Great Place! Great place. Well located, convenient to airport. Typical small hostel. Very clean. Be prepared to share bathroom and shower. Amazing value. I am returning there soon and will stay again. Also recommend it to friends. (Bring earplugs as the bar below can be a bit noisy until 2 am.- otherwise quiet location in a charming area)
Reviews.Author: Worldtraveler200841

Reviews.Content: Friendly Hostel The staff at Fern Lodge were very friendly and were happy to assist you with local information/ booking trips etc. The room we booked was very cosy and clean. The hostel is only small (1 x 10 bed dorm and 3 doubles) which I lked. On a negative side there is only 1 shower room and 1 toilet, which we didn't find a problem, but I can imagine if the hostel is full could be a pain in a morning. The price included breakfast (toast and jam/ peanut butter). The location isn't great as you have to get buses everywhere, but as we were out for each entire day this wasn't too much hassle as the hostel provided info on what buses to get where and when.
Reviews.Author: BSBond
